custom-sql.sql: SELECT archive_pid FROM public.gfbio_Submission WHERE researchobjectid in ( SELECT researchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_researchobject WHERE parentresearchobjectid =( SELECT parentresearchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_researchobject WHERE researchobjectid =( SELECT researchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_submission WHERE archive_pid=?)))

SELECT archive_pid FROM public.gfbio_submission WHERE researchobjectid in ( SELECT researchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_researchobject WHERE public.gfbio_researchobject.researchobjecttype = ? AND parentresearchobjectid =( SELECT parentresearchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_researchobject WHERE researchobjectid =( SELECT researchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_submission WHERE archive_pid=?)))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY researchobjectid, archive ORDER BY researchobjectversion DESC) AS pos FROM gfbio_submission where gfbio_submission.researchobjectid = ? AND gfbio_submission.archive = ? ) AS iq WHERE pos=1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY researchobjectid, archive ORDER BY researchobjectversion DESC) AS pos FROM gfbio_submission ) AS iq WHERE pos=1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY researchobjectid, archive ORDER BY researchobjectversion DESC) AS pos FROM gfbio_submission where gfbio_submission.archive = ? ) AS iq WHERE pos=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY researchobjectid, archive ORDER BY researchobjectversion DESC) AS pos FROM gfbio_submission where gfbio_submission.researchobjectid = ? ) AS iq WHERE pos=1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, rank() OVER (ORDER BY last_changed DESC) AS pos FROM public.gfbio_submission WHERE is_public = true) AS iq WHERE pos<=?

SELECT public.gfbio_submission.researchobjectversion FROM public.gfbio_submission WHERE gfbio_submission.researchobjectid = ? AND gfbio_submission.archive = ? AND gfbio_submission.brokersubmissionid = ?
SELECT gfbio_submission.status FROM public.gfbio_submission where gfbio_submission.researchobjectid = ? AND gfbio_submission.researchobjectversion = ? AND gfbio_submission.archive = ?
SELECT * FROM public.gfbio_submission where gfbio_submission.researchobjectid = ? AND gfbio_submission.researchobjectversion = ? AND gfbio_submission.archive = ?
SELECT gfbio_submission.submissionid FROM public.gfbio_submission where gfbio_submission.researchobjectid = ? AND gfbio_submission.researchobjectversion = ? AND gfbio_submission.archive = ?
